resources.string: I need X/I have X/What do I need?
If you see this, help is not configured correctly.
Use the screen to aid interaction. Switch this off for the visually impaired.
Use keyboard or mic for input. Display/edit it before pressing play button.
Be more helpful: show help on startup; give more comprehensive replies.
press the mike button and say help to the speak now screen.
tap the center of the screen, pause, then say help
tap the center of the screen, pause, then speak
You can say, help, to get help.
For multiple items use X and Y and …

Hint: use the same phrase/spelling used for added items on removing them!
Note: explicitly remove \'I need to X\', with \'I don\'t need to X\'
For further details, including device control and how to program this language engine, see www.yagadi.com
